title: Full-Stack Java Development: From First Principles to Production
description: Master Java from absolute beginner to production-ready full-stack developer. This comprehensive 16-module curriculum covers Java fundamentals, object-oriented programming, functional programming with streams, concurrency with virtual threads, databases with JPA/Hibernate, REST APIs, Spring Boot 4.0+, security with JWT authentication, Thymeleaf and React frontend integration, DevOps with Docker and CI/CD, and culminates in a complete full-stack capstone project. Learn through Socratic mentorship and hands-on coding challenges.
prerequisites: Basic computer literacy (using files, folders, web browser)
Willingness to learn and practice consistently
learningOutcomes: Write clean, idiomatic Java code using modern features (Java 25+)
Design and implement object-oriented systems with SOLID principles
Use functional programming with lambdas, streams, and collectors
Build concurrent applications with virtual threads
Design and query relational databases with SQL and JPA/Hibernate
Create RESTful APIs with Spring Boot 4.0+
Implement authentication and authorization with JWT
Build interactive frontends with Thymeleaf and React
Deploy applications with Docker and CI/CD pipelines
Deploy a full-stack application (Spring Boot + Thymeleaf/React) to the cloud
Complete a full-stack application from design to deployment
